text: Dollar Tree is an American multi-price-point chain of discount variety stores. It is headquartered in Chesapeake, Virginia. It operates 15,115 stores throughout the 48 contiguous U.S. states and Canada. It competes in the dollar store and low-end retail markets. Each Dollar Tree stocks a variety of products, including national, regional, and private-label brands. It was founded in 1986. Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1986 establishments in the United States
title: Dollar Tree
